  • |JSP
  • |Table tag
  • Latest release: 0.9.0

Table tag


Description

Decribes how the HTML table should be generated.


Usage

<datatables:table>
   ...
</datatables:table>

Reference

Name Description Value(s) Default Data source
id (required) DOM id of the HTML table
data (Either data or url attribute is required) Collection of data used to populate the table DOM
url (Either data or url attribute is required) Web service URL used to populate the table AJAX
row Name of the object representing the current row. If data must be displayed without any decoration, use property attribute on column tag DOM
appear Display mode used when the table has finished loading and must appear in the page. A duration can be set (in milliseconds) if the display mode is set to "fadein" block|fadein[,duration] DOM/AJAX
cdn Enable the DataTables source files to be loaded from the Microsoft CDN (Content Delivery Framework) preventing you from hosting the files yourself. true|false false DOM/AJAX
cssStyle CSS style applied on the HTML table (HTML style attribute) DOM/AJAX
cssClass CSS class(es) applied on the HTML table (HTML class attribute) DOM/AJAX
rowIdBase Useful if you want each row has a DOM id. This attribute is evaluated as a property of the current iterated bean (Only if DOM datasource) DOM
rowIdPrefix String which is prepended to the rowIdBase attribute, in order to build row id (HTML id attribute) DOM
rowIdSufix String which is appended to the rowIdBase attribute, in order to build row id (HTML id attribute) DOM
info Enable or disable the table information display. This shows information about the data that is currently visible on the page, including information about filtered data if that action is being performed true|false true DOM/AJAX
paginate Enable or disable pagination true|false true DOM/AJAX
lengthChange If paginate is enabled, allows the end user to select the size of a formatted page from a select menu (sizes are 10, 25, 50 and 100) true|false true DOM/AJAX
paginationType Choice between the different built-in pagination interaction methods which present different page controls to the end user two_button|
full_numbers|
four_button|
bootstrap|
scrolling|
input|
listbox|
extJs		 two_button DOM/AJAX
filter Enable or disable filtering of data true|false true DOM/AJAX
sort Enable or disable sorting of columns. Sorting of individual columns can be disabled by the "sortable" attribute of column tag true|false true DOM/AJAX
autoWidth Enable or disable automatic column width calculation true|false true DOM/AJAX
displayLength Number of rows to display on a single page when using pagination 10 DOM/AJAX
processing Enable or disable the display of a 'processing' indicator when the table is being processed (e.g. a sort). This is particularly useful for tables with large amounts of data where it can take a noticeable amount of time to sort the entries true|false false AJAX
export Enable or disable the export functionality true|false false DOM
exportLinks Comma-separated list of positions where the export links will be generated top_left|
top_middle|
top_right|
bottom_left|
bottom_middle|
bottom_right		 top_right DOM
labels Relative URL of an AJAX loaded file which contains all the labels used in tables DOM/AJAX
jqueryUI Enable jQuery UI ThemeRoller support true|false false DOM/AJAX
fixedHeader Enable or disable the DataTables FixedHeader plugin true|false false DOM/AJAX
fixedPosition (fixedHeader) Respectively fix the header, footer, left column, right column top|bottom|left|right top DOM/AJAX
offsetTop (fixedHeader) Offset applied on the top. DOM/AJAX
scroller Enable or disable the DataTables Scroller plugin true|false false DOM/AJAX
scrollY (scroller) Table's height to display in scrolling mode. 300px DOM/AJAX
scrollCollapse When vertical (y) scrolling is enabled, DataTables will force the height of the table's viewport to the given height at all times (useful for layout). However, this can look odd when filtering data down to a small data set, and the footer is left "floating" further down. This parameter (when enabled) will cause DataTables to collapse the table's viewport down when the result set will fit within the given Y height. true|false false DOM/AJAX
colReorder Enable or disable the DataTables ColReorder plugin true|false false DOM/AJAX
theme Name of a theme to activate for the current table bootstrap2|jqueryui DOM/AJAX
themeOption Name of an option to activate in relation to the current activated theme. * DOM/AJAX
serverSide Configure DataTables to use server-side processing. true|false false AJAX
pipelining Enable pipelining data for paging when server-side processing is enabled. true|false false AJAX
pipeSize Pipe size used when pipelining is enabled, i.e. times that the user can page before a request must be made of the server. 5 AJAX
cssStripes Comma-separated list of CSS classes that should be applied to displayed rows. This sequence of CSS classes may be of any length, and DataTables will apply each class sequentially, looping when required. DOM/AJAX
lengthMenu Specify the entries in the length drop down menu that DataTables show when pagination is enabled DOM/AJAX
serverData Allows you to override the default function which obtains the data from the server ($.getJSON) so something more suitable for your application AJAX
serverParams Allows you to send extra information to the server when using AJAX source AJAX
dom Allows you to specify exactly where in the DOM you want DataTables to inject the various controls it adds to the page (for example you might want the pagination controls at the top of the table). DIV elements (with or without a custom class) can also be added to aid styling. lfrtip DOM/AJAX

* The available values for the themeOption attribute are : blacktie, blitzer, cupertino, darkhive, dotluv, eggplant, excitebike, flick, hotsneaks, humanity, lefrog, mintchoc, overcast, peppergrinder, redmond, smoothness, southstreet, start, sunny, swankypurse, trontastic, uidarkness, uilightness, and vader.
